comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "William Morris Hunt (March 31, 1824 – September 8, 1879) American painter, was born at Brattleboro, Vermont to Jane Maria (Leavitt) Hunt and [Congressman] Jonathan Hunt, who raised one of the preeminent families in American art. William Morris Hunt was the leading painter of mid-19th century Boston, Massachusetts." -- Wikipedia
